type.label: Type
type.description: Structural designation for the entry (Asset, Platform, or Wrapper)

category.label: Category
category.description: High level economic bucket describing the type of RWA or financial product represented

assetClass.label: Asset Class
assetClass.description: Granular economic type within a Category describing how the exposure is structured

onChainMarketcap.label: On-chain Marketcap
onChainMarketcap.description: Total USD value of the asset that exists on chain across tracked chains

activeMarketcap.label: Active Marketcap
activeMarketcap.description: Portion of on chain TVL taking real market risk in user or protocol hands

defiActiveTvl.label: DeFi Active TVL
defiActiveTvl.description: Subset of Active TVL deployed in third party DeFi protocols tracked by DeFiLlama

rwaClassification.label: RWA Classification
rwaClassification.description: High level classification describing the economic nature of the entry

values.True RWA: Tokenized real-world asset that is transferable and self-custodial, with both documented redemption and reserve or asset verification
values.RWA: Tokenized real-world asset that is transferable and self-custodial, with either documented redemption or reserve or asset verification
values.Programmable Finance: RWA-linked onchain products like wrappers, strategy/pool tokens, synthetics, or restricted fund tokens that aren't transferable or self-custodial
values.Non-RWA (Platform): Platform or infrastructure item related to RWAs, not an asset token or RWA exposure instrument
values.Non-RWA (Gov/Utility): Governance or utility token that is not a tokenized real-world asset or RWA exposure instrument

accessModel.label: Access Model
accessModel.description: Indicates how users interact with the asset

values.Permissioned: Requires KYC/AML verification to hold or transfer the asset
values.Permissionless: Open to any wallet address without identity verification
values.Non-transferable: Locked to the original wallet; cannot be transferred to other addresses
values.Custodial Only: Must be held through an authorized custodian; no self-custody option
values.Unknown: Access requirements have not been disclosed

issuer.label: Issuer
issuer.description: Legal entity or organization responsible for issuing or controlling the asset

isin.label: ISIN
isin.description: International Securities Identification Number - a 12-character alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies a specific security

registryInformation.label: Registry Information
registryInformation.description: Identifiers or registry data for the issuer from corporate or regulatory databases

source.label: Source
source.description: Primary public reference confirming issuer information

primaryChain.label: Primary Chain
primaryChain.description: Single chain slug representing the chain where the asset or platform is primarily issued or anchored

redeemable.label: Redeemable
redeemable.description: Indicates whether the token can be redeemed for underlying assets

attestations.label: Attestations
attestations.description: Indicates whether the issuer provides periodic attestations or assurance reports regarding reserves or backing

cexListed.label: CEX Listed
cexListed.description: Indicates whether the token is listed on a centralized exchange

kycForMintRedeem.label: KYC to Mint or Redeem
kycForMintRedeem.description: Indicates whether minting or redeeming the token through the issuer or primary market requires KYC/AML verification (KYC/KYB/onboarding)

kycAllowlistedWhitelistedToTransferHold.label: KYC/Allowlisted/Whitelisted to Transfer/Hold
kycAllowlistedWhitelistedToTransferHold.description: Indicates whether holding or transferring the token requires prior verification or allowlisting/whitelisting (issuer or transfer-agent permissioning), enforced at the token, contract, or venue level

transferable.label: Transferable
transferable.description: Indicates whether the token can be transferred freely between on chain addresses

selfCustody.label: Self Custody
selfCustody.description: Indicates whether the token can be held in a user controlled wallet
